review: Extremely  happy! Dr Rohit is highly professional and listens completely to the problems . He is very polite and speaks in a way which gives confidence and comfort to the patients. ** ******* ********* *********** ***** *** *********** *** tries to resolve the problem completely.  Thank you Doctor. Appreciate your suggestions and service. I strongly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr.Rohit was very supportive and was patiently listening to my problems, even though there were patients waiting outside. He was very friendly in his approach. Best part is he discussed different treatment options with me and suggested what would be the best course of action for me based on my condition. Would definitely recommend Dr.Rohit *** **** ******** *****
